article.headline: Texas Tech 87, Sam Houston St. 76
article.story: LUBBOCK, Texas -- Nick Okorie and Mike Singletary each scored 18 points to lead Texas Tech to an 87-76 win over Sam Houston State Monday night. John Roberson scored 14 and D'Walyn Roberts added 10 for Texas Tech (2-0). Cory Almond led Sam Houston State (1-1) with 23 points on 5-of-8 shooting from the 3-point line. Lance Pevehouse added 12 points. The Red Raiders led 40-30 at the half and outscored Sam Houston State 31-18 to open the second half, effectively putting any type of comeback out of Sam Houston?s reach. With the win, the Red Raiders avenged a 56-54 loss to Sam Houston State last season in Huntsville.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
